column4: hi, i'm having a problem logging in. I bot up, and at the enter my credentials at the login screen. I hit enter at the end of my password, and the field goes gray...i wait, nothing happens. i can still move my cursor and select the shutdown/etc. menu, but it won't log in.
try Ctrl+Alt+F1 and logging in there. USE Ctrl+Alt+F7 to switch back!
